      Subclasses of Card in card 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CreditCard
      This card is used to calculate the price of a ride for a user who does not have any card subscription.

      This class represents VLibre Cards.

      This class represents VMax Cards.

    • Uses of Card in station

      Methods in station with parameters of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double Station.dropBike(Card card, java.time.LocalDateTime dropTime)
      This method allows to drop a Bike if the Station is online, if the User of the Card has an ongoing Ride and if there is an available Slot.
      double PlusStation.dropBike(Card card, java.time.LocalDateTime dropTime)
      If a User drops a Bike in a PlusStation, he gains 5 Time Credits on his subscription Card (if he has one).
      User Station.identifyUser(Card card) 
      void Station.pickUpBike(Card card, java.time.LocalDateTime pickUpTime)
      This method allows to pick up a Bike if the Station is online, if the User of the Card has no ongoing Ride and if there is an a Slot with a Bike available
      void Station.pickUpElectricBike(Card card, java.time.LocalDateTime pickUpTime)
      This method allows to pick up a ElectricBike if the Station is online, if the User of the Card has no ongoing Ride and if there is an a Slot with a ElectricBike available
      void Station.pickUpMechanicBike(Card card, java.time.LocalDateTime pickUpTime)
      This method allows to pick up a MechanicBike if the Station is online, if the User of the Card has no ongoing Ride and if there is an a Slot with a MechanicBike available

    • Uses of Card in user

      Methods in user with parameters of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void User.startOngoingRide(Network net, Bike bike, java.time.LocalDateTime startRide, Card card)
      If the User does not have an ongoing Ride, this method sets a new ongoing Ride.
